name: Tumbleshift
description:
Hey! Tumbleshift is free infinite runner game made in 48 hours. Burn chickens, avoid barrels, enjoy!.

(Windows & Linux builds are not tested yet, sorry for any inconvenience)

checkout the website => http://mr.pn/tumbleshift

------

We are an indie team, this was our first ludumdare. If you want to contact about anything, see twitter links below :
